### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.google.com/search?q=fatman+scoop&oq=fatman+scoop&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOdIBCDE5OTZqMGo0qAIAsAIB&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dfatman%2Bscoop%26oq%3Dfatman%2Bscoop%26gs_lcrp%3DEgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOdIBCDE5OTZqMGo0qAIAsAIB%26sourceid%3Dchrome%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment > I dont know why is this happening only on certain phrases, but if you open anonymous (or fresh) browser window and you try to enter first google search, this annoying popup keeps appearing even after couple of reloads as you can see in the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LzELkh7Q4-U 🤔 It happens always with phrase "fatman scoop" for example 🤔 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
On my end these rules:
```adblock
maxmovie.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MezzoAD', 'noopFunc')
maxmovie.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MezzoAD.prototype.setView', 'noopFunc')
maxmovie.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MezzoAD.prototype.setArea', 'noopFunc')
maxmovie.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MezzoAD.prototype.request', 'noopFunc')
```
fix this error (the order matter and `maxmovie.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MezzoAD', 'noopFunc')` have to be added first, otherwise it will not works).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. Umanle S.R.L.가 AdGuard의 광고 차단을 방해하고 있습니다.

나무위키 운영사인 Umanle S.R.L.가 나무위키의 DOM 구조를 관련된 필터 업데이트가 있을 때 마다 변경하므로 필터로 차단하기에는 오차단이 발생할 수 있습니다.

또한, Umanle S.R.L.가 기술적인 안티-애드블록하여 의도적으로 나무위키 문서를 읽을 수 없게 했던 점과 전용 유저스크립트인 NamuLink의 차단 방법을 우회하게끔 네이버 파워링크 광고 알고리즘을 업데이트합니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치

[NamuLink 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/NamuLink)를 설치하여 나무위키의 파워링크 광고를 차단하실 수 있습니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 방법은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/NamuLink)를 클릭하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/NamuLink/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body:
Hi @Alex-302 problem persists:

```bash
~ nslookup rex.de 94.140.14.15
Server:         94.140.14.15
Address:        94.140.14.15#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:   rex.de
Address: 94.140.14.35
```

```bash
nslookup rex.de 94.140.14.14
Server:         94.140.14.14
Address:        94.140.14.14#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:   rex.de
Address: 195.30.85.70
```

The domain seems to be classified incorrectly for the family filter, because it has been parked years ago.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
